name: Road Rage (itch) (aabicus)
description:
Made for my master degree's "Level Design" class. Up to three players can race karts around six different tracks, trying to be the last one standing. Every map can be played in PvP or PvE versus bots. 

All art assets come from Multimedia Fusion. Songs are from Mathgrant's album "30s30d". Thanks to Professor MJ and the UCSC Games & Playable Media program!
